mapper.select: SELECT B.BARNO, B.BARNAME, B.USERID, B.PROFILENO, B.LOCATIONNO, B.BARINFO, B.MANAGER, B.BARADDRESS, B.GENRENO, P.PATH, P.ORIGINNAME, P.STOREDNAME FROM BAR B LEFT OUTER JOIN PROFILEPIC P ON B.PROFILENO = P.PROFILENO ORDER BY BARNO

SELECT L.LOCATIONNO, L.LOCATIONNAME, B.BARNO, B.BARNAME, B.USERID, B.PROFILENO, B.LOCATIONNO, B.BARINFO, B.MANAGER, B.BARADDRESS, B.GENRENO, P.PATH, P.ORIGINNAME, P.STOREDNAME, G.GENRENAME FROM LOCATION L LEFT OUTER JOIN BAR B ON B.LOCATIONNO = L.LOCATIONNO LEFT OUTER JOIN PROFILEPIC P ON P.PROFILENO = B.PROFILENO LEFT OUTER JOIN GENRE G ON G.GENRENO = B.GENRENO WHERE L.LOCATIONNO IN
#{item }

SELECT B.BARNO, B.BARNAME, B.USERID, B.PROFILENO, B.LOCATIONNO, B.BARINFO, B.MANAGER, B.BARADDRESS, B.GENRENO, P.PATH, P.ORIGINNAME, P.STOREDNAME, L.LOCATIONNAME, G.GENRENAME FROM BAR B, PROFILEPIC P, LOCATION L, GENRE G WHERE B.PROFILENO = P.PROFILENO AND B.GENRENO = G.GENRENO AND B.LOCATIONNO = L.LOCATIONNO AND B.BARNO = #{barNo }
mapper.update: UPDATE BAR SET BARINFO=#{barInfo }, manager=#{manager } WHERE BARNO=#{barNo }
UPDATE MEMBER SET contact=#{contact } WHERE USERID=#{userId }
mapper.select: SELECT ProfileNo, path, OriginName, StoredName FROM profilePic ORDER BY profileNo
